    display: block;
  }

  > .active {
    left: 0;
  }

  > .next,
  > .prev {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    width: 100%;
  }

  > .next {
    left: 100%;
  }
  > .prev {
    left: -100%;
  }
  > .next.left,
  > .prev.right {
    left: 0;
  }

  > .active.left {
    left: -100%;
  }
  > .active.right {
    left: 100%;
  }

}

// Left/right controls for nav
// ---------------------------

.carousel-control {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  width: @carousel-control-width;
  .opacity(@carousel-control-opacity);
  font-size: @carousel-control-font-size;
  color: @carousel-control-color;
  text-align: center;
  text-shadow: @carousel-text-shadow;
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); // Fix IE9 click-thru bug
  // We can't have this transition here because WebKit cancels the carousel
  // animation if you trip this while in the middle of another animation.

  // Set gradients for backgrounds
  &.left {
    #gradient > .horizontal(@start-color: rgba(0,0,0,.5); @end-color: rgba(0,0,0,.0001));
  }
  &.right {
    left: auto;
    right: 0;
    #gradient > .horizontal(@start-color: rgba(0,0,0,.0001); @end-color: rgba(0,0,0,.5));
  }

  // Hover/focus state
  &:hover,
  &:focus {
    outline: 0;
    color: @carousel-control-color;
    text-decoration: none;
    .opacity(.9);
  }

  // Toggles
  .icon-prev,
  .icon-next,
  .glyphicon-chevron-left,
  .glyphicon-chevron-right {
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    margin-top: -10px;
    z-index: 5;
    display: inline-block;
  }
  .icon-prev,
  .glyphicon-chevron-left {
    left: 50%;
    margin-left: -10px;
  }
  .icon-next,
  .glyphicon-chevron-right {
    right: 50%;
    margin-right: -10px;
  }
  .icon-prev,
  .icon-next {
    width:  20px;
    height: 20px;
    line-height: 1;
    font-family: serif;
  }


  .icon-prev {
    &:before {
      content: '\2039';// SINGLE LEFT-POINTING ANGLE QUOTATION MARK (U+2039)
    }
  }
  .icon-next {
    &:before {
      content: '\203a';// SINGLE RIGHT-POINTING ANGLE QUOTATION MARK (U+203A)
    }
  }
}

// Optional indicator pips
//
// Add an unordered list with the following class and add a list item for each
// slide your carousel holds.

.carousel-indicators {
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 10px;
  left: 50%;
  z-index: 15;
  width: 60%;
  margin-left: -30%;
  padding-left: 0;
  list-style: none;
  text-align: center;

  li {
    display: inline-block;
    width:  10px;
    height: 10px;
    margin: 1px;
    text-indent: -999px;
    border: 1px solid @carousel-indicator-border-color;
    border-radius: 10px;
    cursor: pointer;

    // IE8-9 hack for event handling
    //
    // Internet Explorer 8-9 does not support clicks on elements without a set
    // `background-color`. We cannot use `filter` since that's not viewed as a
    // background color by the browser. Thus, a hack is needed.
    // See https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Events/click#Internet_Explorer
    //
    // For IE8, we set solid black as it doesn't support `rgba()`. For IE9, we
    // set alpha transparency for the best results possible.
    background-color: #000 \9; // IE8
    background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0); // IE9
  }
  .active {
    margin: 0;
    width:  12px;
    height: 12px;
    background-color: @carousel-indicator-active-bg;
  }
}

// Optional captions
// -----------------------------
// Hidden by default for smaller viewports
.carousel-caption {
  position: absolute;
  left: 15%;
  right: 15%;
  bottom: 20px;
  z-index: 10;
  padding-top: 20px;
  padding-bottom: 20px;
  color: @carousel-caption-color;
  text-align: center;
  text-shadow: @carousel-text-shadow;
  & .btn {
    text-shadow: none; // No shadow for button elements in carousel-caption
  }
}


// Scale up controls for tablets and up
@media screen and (min-width: @screen-sm-min) {

  // Scale up the controls a smidge
  .carousel-control {
    .glyphicon-chevron-left,
    .glyphicon-chevron-right,
    .icon-prev,
    .icon-next {
      width: (@carousel-control-font-size * 1.5);
      height: (@carousel-control-font-size * 1.5);
      margin-top: (@carousel-control-font-size / -2);
      font-size: (@carousel-control-font-size * 1.5);
    }
    .glyphicon-chevron-left,
    .icon-prev {
      margin-left: (@carousel-control-font-size / -2);
    }
    .glyphicon-chevron-right,
    .icon-next {
      margin-right: (@carousel-control-font-size / -2);
    }
  }

  // Show and left align the captions
  .carousel-caption {
    left: 20%;
    right: 20%;
    padding-bottom: 30px;
  }

  // Move up the indicators
  .carousel-indicators {
    bottom: 20px;
  }
}
// Clearfix
//
// For modern browsers
// 1. The space content is one way to avoid an Opera bug when the
//    contenteditable attribute is included anywhere else in the document.
//    Otherwise it causes space to appear at the top and bottom of elements
//    that are clearfixed.
// 2. The use of `table` rather than `block` is only necessary if using
//    `:before` to contain the top-margins of child elements.
//
// Source: http://nicolasgallagher.com/micro-clearfix-hack/

.clearfix() {
  &:before,
  &:after {
    content: " "; // 1
    display: table; // 2
  }
  &:after {
    clear: both;
  }
}
//
// Utility classes
// --------------------------------------------------


// Floats
// -------------------------

.clearfix {
  .clearfix();
}
.center-block {
  .center-block();
}
.pull-right {
  float: right !important;
}
.pull-left {
  float: left !important;
}


// Toggling content
// -------------------------

// Note: Deprecated .hide in favor of .hidden or .sr-only (as appropriate) in v3.0.1
.hide {
  display: none !important;
}
.show {
  display: block !important;
}
.invisible {
  visibility: hidden;
}
.text-hide {
  .text-hide();
}


// Hide from screenreaders and browsers
//
// Credit: HTML5 Boilerplate

.hidden {
  display: none !important;
}


// For Affix plugin
// -------------------------

.affix {
  position: fixed;
}
// Center-align a block level element

.center-block() {
  display: block;
  margin-left: auto;
  margin-right: auto;
}
// CSS image replacement
//
// Heads up! v3 launched with only `.hide-text()`, but per our pattern for
// mixins being reused as classes with the same name, this doesn't hold up. As
// of v3.0.1 we have added `.text-hide()` and deprecated `.hide-text()`.
//
// Source: https://github.com/h5bp/html5-boilerplate/commit/aa0396eae757

// Deprecated as of v3.0.1 (has been removed in v4)
.hide-text() {
  font: ~"0/0" a;
  color: transparent;
  text-shadow: none;
  background-color: transparent;
  border: 0;
}

// New mixin to use as of v3.0.1
.text-hide() {
  .hide-text();
}

// IE10 in Windows (Phone) 8
//
// Support for responsive views via media queries is kind of borked in IE10, for
// Surface/desktop in split view and for Windows Phone 8. This particular fix
// must be accompanied by a snippet of JavaScript to sniff the user agent and
// apply some conditional CSS to *only* the Surface/desktop Windows 8. Look at
// our Getting Started page for more information on this bug.
//
// For more information, see the following:
//
// Issue: https://github.com/twbs/bootstrap/issues/10497
// Docs: http://getbootstrap.com/getting-started/#support-ie10-width
// Source: http://timkadlec.com/2013/01/windows-phone-8-and-device-width/
// Source: http://timkadlec.com/2012/10/ie10-snap-mode-and-responsive-design/

@-ms-viewport {
  width: device-width;
}


// Visibility utilities
// Note: Deprecated .visible-xs, .visible-sm, .visible-md, and .visible-lg as of v3.2.0

.visible-md,

}

.visible-xs-block,
.visible-xs-inline,
.visible-xs-inline-block,
.visible-sm-block,
.visible-sm-inline,
.visible-sm-inline-block,

.visible-lg {

// Print utilities
//
// Media queries are placed on the inside to be mixin-friendly.

// Note: Deprecated .visible-print as of v3.2.0
.visible-print {
  .responsive-invisibility();

  @media print {
    .responsive-visibility();
  }
}
.visible-print-block {
  display: none !important;

  @media print {
    display: block !important;
  }
}
.visible-print-inline {
  display: none !important;

  @media print {
    display: inline !important;
  }
}
.visible-print-inline-block {
  display: none !important;

  @media print {
    display: inline-block !important;
  }
}

.hidden-print {
  @media print {
    .responsive-invisibility();
  }

// Responsive utilities

//
// More easily include all the states for responsive-utilities.less.
.responsive-visibility() {
  display: block !important;
  table&  { display: table !important; }
  tr&     { display: table-row !important; }
  th&,
  td&     { display: table-cell !important; }
}

.responsive-invisibility() {
  display: none !important;

.element-preperty{
  //6plus竖屏
  .appple-6plus-v(@element;@prepery){
    @media (min-width: @screen-xpv) and (max-width: @screen-xpvx)
      and  (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio : 3){
      @{element}:@prepery;
      background-color: @content-v-background-color;

    }
  }

  //6plus横屏
  .appple-6plus-h(@element;@prepery){
    @media (min-width: @screen-xp) and (max-width: @screen-xpx ) and  (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio : 3){
        @{element}:@prepery;
        background-color: @content-h-background-color;
    }
  }
  //华为、三星5寸，竖屏
  .android-dpr2-v(@element;@prepery){
    @media (min-width: @screen-sclv) and (max-width: @screen-sclvx) and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio :2){
        @{element}:@prepery;
        background-color: @content-v-background-color;
    }
  }
  //华为5寸，横屏
  .android-dpr2-h(@element;@prepery){
    @media (min-width: @screen-scl) and (max-width: @screen-sclx) and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio :2){
        @{element}:@prepery;
      background-color: @content-v-background-color;
    }
  }

  //三星5.8，竖屏 oppo
  .android-dpr1g-v(@element;@prepery) {
    @media (min-width: @screen-gtv) and (max-width:@screen-gtvx)
    and  (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio : 1) and (-webkit-max-device-pixel-ratio :1.9) {
        @{element}:@prepery;
      background-color: @content-v-background-color;
      }
  }

  //三星5.8，横屏bottom oppo,大于1
  .android-dpr1g-h(@element;@prepery){
    @media (min-width: @screen-gt) and (max-width: @screen-gtx )
    and   (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio : 1) and (-webkit-max-device-pixel-ratio :1.9){
        @{element}:@prepery;
        background-color: @content-v-background-color;
    }
  }

  //设备宽度和屏幕宽度，pad2 横屏
  .apple-pad2-h(@element;@prepery){
    @media (min-width : @screen-pad2v) and (max-device-width :
            @screen-pad2vv) and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio : 1) and (-webkit-max-device-pixel-ratio : 2){
        @{element}:@prepery;
        background-color: @content-v-background-color;
    }
  }

  //设备宽度和屏幕宽度，pad2
  .apple-pad2-v(@element;@prepery){
    @media (min-width : @screen-pad2) and (max-device-width :
            @screen-pad2a) and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio : 1) and (-webkit-max-device-pixel-ratio : 2) {
        @{element}:@prepery;
        background-color: @content-v-background-color;
    }
  }
   //笔记本，ie,firefix
  .pc-lg-xl(@element;@prepery){
    @media(min-width: @screen-lg-xl) and (max-width: @screen-lg-xlx){
        @{element}:@prepery;
        background-color: @content-v-background-color;
    }
  }

  .pc-lg-chrome(@element;@prepery) {
    @media (min-width: @screen-lg-chrome) and (max-width: @screen-lg-chromex) {
        @{element}:@prepery;
        background-color: @content-v-background-color;
    }
  }

  //@screen-xs,小于480,手机,349,
  .boot-xs-min(@element;@prepery){
    @media (max-width: @screen-min-vmax) and (min-width: @screen-min-v){
        @{element}:@prepery;
      background-color: @content-v-background-color;
    }
  }

  //@screen-xs,小于480,手机
  .boot-min(@element;@prepery){
    @media (max-width: @screen-min-xsm){
        @{element}:@prepery;
      background-color: @content-v-background-color;
    }
  }

  .boot-xs(@element;@prepery) {
    @media (min-width: 425px) and (max-width: 479px) {
        @{element}: @prepery;
      background-color: @content-v-background-color;
      //background-color: #41ffe3;
    }
  }

  //按照pad2,1199,769
  .boot-sm(@element;@prepery) {
    @media (min-width: @screen-pad-md) and (max-width: @screen-pad-md-max) {
        @{element}:@prepery;
      background-color: @content-v-background-color;
      //background-color:greenyellow;
    }
  }

  //1200~1439
  .boot-desktop(@element;@prepery) {
    @media (min-width: @screen-lg-xs) and (max-width: @screen-lg-xs-max) {
        @{element}:@prepery;
      background-color: @content-v-background-color;
    }
  }

  //按照最大屏幕设置
  .boot-max(@element;@prepery) {
    @media (min-width:@screen-lg-xl) {
        @{element}:@prepery;
      background-color: @content-v-background-color;
    }

  }

  //竖屏时处理变量
  .props-vertical(@element;@prepery){
     .android-dpr2-v(@element;@prepery);
     .android-dpr1g-v(@element;@prepery);
     .appple-6plus-v(@element;@prepery);
     .apple-pad2-v(@element;@prepery);
     /////////////////////////////////////
     .boot-min(@element;@prepery);
     .boot-xs(@element;@prepery);

  }
  //横屏处理变量
  .props-horizontal(@element;@prepery){
    .pc-lg-xl(@element;@prepery);
    .pc-lg-chrome(@element;@prepery);

    .android-dpr2-h(@element;@prepery);

    .android-dpr1g-h(@element;@prepery);

    .appple-6plus-h(@element;@prepery);


    .apple-pad2-h(@element;@prepery);

    //////////////////////////////////
    .boot-sm(@element;@prepery);
    //////////////////////////跟随Pad横屏设置
    .boot-desktop(@element;@prepery);
    .boot-max(@element;@prepery);
    /////////////////////////////////
  }
}

//华为、三星5寸，竖屏
.height-5scl-v(@height){

//华为5寸，横屏
.height-5scl-h(@height){

  position: relative;
  //width:@width;
  //height:@height;

  left: @left;
  -webkit-transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(0);
  -moz-transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-0);
  -ms-transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(0);
  -o-transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(0);;
  transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(0);
}

  left: 50%;

  -moz-transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-0);
  -ms-transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(0);
  -o-transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(0);;
  transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(0);
}

// 3. Address margins set differently in Firefox 4+, Safari, and Chrome.
//

button,
input,
optgroup,
select,
textarea {
  color: inherit; // 1
  font: inherit; // 2
  margin: 0; // 3
}

//
// Address `overflow` set to `hidden` in IE 8/9/10/11.
//

button {
  overflow: visible;
}

//
// Address inconsistent `text-transform` inheritance for `button` and `select`.
// All other form control elements do not inherit `text-transform` values.
// Correct `button` style inheritance in Firefox, IE 8/9/10/11, and Opera.
// Correct `select` style inheritance in Firefox.
//

button,
select {
  text-transform: none;
}

//
// 1. Avoid the WebKit bug in Android 4.0.* where (2) destroys native `audio`
//    and `video` controls.
// 2. Correct inability to style clickable `input` types in iOS.
// 3. Improve usability and consistency of cursor style between image-type
//    `input` and others.
//

button,
html input[type="button"], // 1
input[type="reset"],
input[type="submit"] {
  -webkit-appearance: button; // 2
  cursor: pointer; // 3
}

//
// Re-set default cursor for disabled elements.
//

button[disabled],
html input[disabled] {
  cursor: default;
}

//
// Remove inner padding and border in Firefox 4+.
//

button::-moz-focus-inner,
input::-moz-focus-inner {
  border: 0;
  padding: 0;
}

//
// Address Firefox 4+ setting `line-height` on `input` using `!important` in
// the UA stylesheet.
//

input {
  line-height: normal;
}

//
// It's recommended that you don't attempt to style these elements.
// Firefox's implementation doesn't respect box-sizing, padding, or width.
//
// 1. Address box sizing set to `content-box` in IE 8/9/10.
// 2. Remove excess padding in IE 8/9/10.
//

input[type="checkbox"],
input[type="radio"] {
  box-sizing: border-box; // 1
  padding: 0; // 2
}

//
// Fix the cursor style for Chrome's increment/decrement buttons. For certain
// `font-size` values of the `input`, it causes the cursor style of the
// decrement button to change from `default` to `text`.
//

input[type="number"]::-webkit-inner-spin-button,
input[type="number"]::-webkit-outer-spin-button {
  height: auto;
}

//
// 1. Address `appearance` set to `searchfield` in Safari and Chrome.
// 2. Address `box-sizing` set to `border-box` in Safari and Chrome.
//

input[type="search"] {
  -webkit-appearance: textfield; // 1
  box-sizing: content-box; //2
}

//
// Remove inner padding and search cancel button in Safari and Chrome on OS X.
// Safari (but not Chrome) clips the cancel button when the search input has
// padding (and `textfield` appearance).
//

input[type="search"]::-webkit-search-cancel-button,
input[type="search"]::-webkit-search-decoration {
  -webkit-appearance: none;
}

//
// Define consistent border, margin, and padding.
//

fieldset {
  border: 1px solid #c0c0c0;
  margin: 0 2px;
  padding: 0.35em 0.625em 0.75em;
}

//
// 1. Correct `color` not being inherited in IE 8/9/10/11.
// 2. Remove padding so people aren't caught out if they zero out fieldsets.
//

legend {
  border: 0; // 1
  padding: 0; // 2
}

//
// Remove default vertical scrollbar in IE 8/9/10/11.
//

textarea {
  overflow: auto;
}

//
// Don't inherit the `font-weight` (applied by a rule above).
// NOTE: the default cannot safely be changed in Chrome and Safari on OS X.
//

optgroup {
  font-weight: bold;
}

// Tables
// ==========================================================================

//
// Remove most spacing between table cells.
//

table {
  border-collapse: collapse;
  border-spacing: 0;
}

td,
th {
  padding: 0;
}

.container-abc {
 //background-color: red;
 @media (max-width: @screen-xpmax) and (min-width:@screen-xpmin) {
  .make-grid(xp);
 }

 @media (min-width: @screen-lg-xs) and (max-width: @screen-lg-xs-max){
  .make-grid(dt);
 }
}

.make-grid-columns-extents();

.make-grid(xp);

.make-grid(dt);


// Framework grid generation
//
// Used only by Bootstrap to generate the correct number of grid classes given
// any value of `@grid-columns`.

.make-grid-columns-extents() {
  // Common styles for all sizes of grid columns, widths 1-12
  .col(@index) { // initial
    @item: ~".col-xs6-@{index}, .col-xp-@{index}, .col-xs5-@{index}, .col-xs4-@{index}";
    .col((@index + 1), @item);
  }
  .col(@index, @list) when (@index =< @grid-columns) { // general; "=<" isn't a typo
    @item: ~".col-xs6-@{index}, .col-xp-@{index}, .col-xs5-@{index}, .col-xs4-@{index}";
    .col((@index + 1), ~"@{list}, @{item}");
  }
  .col(@index, @list) when (@index > @grid-columns) { // terminal
    @{list} {
      position: relative;
      min-height: 1px;
    }
  }
  .col(1); // kickstart it
}

.thumbnail-b-image-abc {
  padding-top:2px;
  padding-right:2px;
  margin-bottom:8px;
  margin-right:2px;
  //margin-left: 20px;
  border:1px solid #ddd;
  border-radius:4px;
  transition:border 0.2s ease-in-out;
  font-size: @content-font-size-lg;
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%;

  @imageWidth:14rem;

  h5,h6,p {
    margin-left: 14px;
  }
  .content-sytle.title-setting(h5);
  .content-sytle.title-setting(h6);
  .content-sytle.content;
  h5,h6{
     &:extend(.content-list-font-lg .title);
  }
  p{
    &:extend(.content-list-font-lg .content);
  }
  .btn{
    &:extend(.content-list-font-lg  .content);
  }

  img{
    width:@image-width-lg;
    height: @image-width-lg;
    margin-left: @image-margin-left-lg;
    //6plus横屏
    .image-6plus-h(@image-width-lg-6plus-v;@image-margin-left-lg;@image-margin-top-lg);
       //华为5寸，横屏
    .image-5scl-h(@image-width-lg-5scl-h;@image-margin-left-lg;@image-margin-top-lg);
    .image-5scl-v(@image-width-lg-5scl-v;@image-margin-left-lg;@image-margin-top-lg);
    //笔记本
    .image-lg-md(  @image-width-lg-lg-md;@image-margin-left-lg;@image-margin-top-lg);
    .image-lg-xl(  @image-width-lg-lg-xl;@image-margin-left-lg;@image-margin-top-lg);
    .image-lg-chrome(@image-width-lg-lg-chrome;@image-margin-left-lg;@image-margin-top-lg);
    //设备宽度和屏幕宽度，pad2
    .image-pad2-v(@image-width-lg-lg-pad2-v;@image-margin-left-lg-pad2-v;@image-margin-top-lg);
    //
    .image-gt-v(@image-width-lg-gt-v;@image-margin-left-lg-gt-v;auto);
    .image-gt-h(@image-width-lg-gt-h;@image-margin-left-lg-gt-h;auto);

  }

  //md
  .b-image{
    &:extend(img);
    width:@image-width-md;
    height: @image-height-md;
    margin-left: @image-margin-left-md;

    .image-gt-v(@image-width-md-gt-v;@image-margin-left-md-gt-v;auto);
    .image-gt-h(@image-width-md-gt-h;@image-margin-left-md-gt-h;auto);

    .image-5scl-h(@image-width-md-scl;
            @image-margin-left-md-scl;@image-margin-top-md);

    .image-lg-chrome(@image-width-md-lg-chrome;
            @image-margin-left-md-lg-chrome;@image-margin-top-md)
  }
  //用于一行显示
  .b-image-xs{
    &:extend(img);
    width:@image-width-xs;
    height: @image-height-xs;
    margin-left:@image-margin-left-xs;
    margin-top: @image-margin-top-xs;
    .alignCenter-common(50%,50%);
  }

  .b-image-inline{
    &:extend(.thumbnail-image-content-abc img);
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
  }

  .b-image-continer{
    display:inline-flex;
    margin-left:@b-image-continer-margin-left;
    margin-top: @image-margin-top-xs;

    .margin-6plus-v(@marginDefault;@marginDefault;@marginDefault;@b-image-continer-margin-left-gt-v);

  }

  .b-content-continer{
    margin-left: -1rem;
  }

  .thumbnail-operator-abc {
    right:0;
    opacity: 0.6;
    .btn{
      //display: block;
    }
  }

  .thumbnail-inline-abc {
    margin-top:6px;
    margin-left: 32px;
    margin-bottom: 6px;
  }

  .thumbnail-md-abc{
    &:extend(.content-list-font-md  .common);
    .content-sytle.title-setting(h5);
    .content-sytle.title-setting(h6);
    .content-sytle.content;
    h5,h6{
      &:extend(.content-list-font-md  .title);
    }

    .btn{
      &:extend(.content-list-font-md  .content);
    }
    p{
      &:extend(.content-list-font-md  .content);
    }
  }

  .thumbnail-xs4-abc {
    margin-top:0px;
    margin-left: 6px;

    h5,p,.btn{
      word-wrap:break-word;
      margin-left: 0px;
      text-overflow:ellipsis;
      //font-size: 9px;
      margin-bottom: 4px;
      margin-top: 4px;
      &:extend(.content-list-font-xs  .common);
      //竖屏
      .marginTopAndBottom-6plus-v(2px,2px);
      .marginTopAndBottom-5scl-v(4px,4px);

    h5{

      line-height:1.4
    }

    &:extend(.content-list-font-xs  .common);

    }

    .btn{
      &:extend(.content-list-font-xs  .content);
    }
    p{
      &:extend(.content-list-font-xs  .content);
    }

  }

}

.toolbar-inline(@position:relative){
  display:  inline-flex;
  //display: flex;
  display:-webkit-box ;
  display:-ms-flexbox;
  //display:-moz-inline-box;
  display: -moz-box;
  position:@position;
}

.content-sytle{
  .title-setting(@element:h5;@lineheight:1.4;@position:relative;@display:inline-block){
    @{element}{
      word-wrap: break-word;
      overflow: hidden;
      font-weight: 700;
      line-height:@lineheight;
      position: @position;
      display: @display;
    }
    @{element}:hover{
      left: 1px;
      color: #77e3ff;
    }
  }
  .content(@element:p){
    @{element}{
      word-wrap: break-word;
      overflow: hidden;
    }
  }
  //删除显示
  .deprecated(@element:span){

  }
  //提示信息
  .warning(@element:span){

  }
}

.element-setting(@width; @height;@marginTop;@marginRight;@marginBottom;@marginLeft){
  width: @width;
  height:@height;
  margin-top: @marginTop;
  margin-left:@marginLeft;
  margin-bottom:@marginBottom;
  margin-right: @marginRight;

}

.image-setting(@width; @marginLeft;@marginTop){
  width: @width;
  height:@width;
  margin-left:@marginLeft;
  margin-right: @marginLeft;
  margin-top: @marginTop;
}

//三星5.8，竖屏
.image-gt-v(@width; @marginLeft: @gt-margin-v-left;@marginTop:@gt-margin-v-top) {
  @media(min-width: @screen-gtv) and (max-width: @screen-gtvx) and
  (-webkit-max-device-pixel-ratio : 1.9) and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio : 1.4){
    .image-setting(@width; @marginLeft;@marginTop);
  }
}

//三星5.8，横屏
.image-gt-h(@width; @marginLeft: @gt-margin-h-left;@marginTop:@gt-margin-h-top) {
  @media(min-width: @screen-gt) and (max-width: @screen-gtx)and
  (-webkit-max-device-pixel-ratio : 1.9) and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio : 1.4){
    .image-setting(@width; @marginLeft;@marginTop);
  }
}
//6plus竖屏
.image-6plus-v(@width; @marginLeft: @6plus-margin-v-left;
                @marginTop: @6plus-margin-v-top){
  @media (min-width: @screen-xpv) and (max-width: @screen-xpvx) and  (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio : 3){
    .image-setting(@width; @marginLeft;@marginTop);
  }
}

//6plus横屏
.image-6plus-h(@width; @marginLeft: @6plus-margin-h-left;
                @marginTop: @6plus-margin-h-top){
  @media (min-width: @screen-xp) and (max-width: @screen-xpx ) and  (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio : 3){
    .image-setting(@width; @marginLeft;@marginTop);
  }
}


//华为、三星5寸，竖屏
.image-5scl-v(@width; @marginLeft: @5scl-72-margin-v-left;
                @marginTop: @5scl-72-margin-v-top){
  @media (min-width: @screen-sclv) and (max-width: @screen-sclvx) and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio :2){
    .image-setting(@width; @marginLeft;@marginTop);
  }
}

//华为5寸，横屏
.image-5scl-h(@width; @marginLeft: @5scl-72-margin-h-left;
                @marginTop: @5scl-72-margin-h-top){
  @media (min-width: @screen-scl) and (max-width: @screen-sclx)and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio :2){
    .image-setting(@width; @marginLeft;@marginTop);
  }
}


//pad2 横屏
.image-pad2-h(@width; @marginLeft: @5scl-72-margin-h-left;
                @marginTop: @5scl-72-margin-h-top){
  @media (min-width : @screen-pad2v) and (max-device-width :
          @screen-pad2vv) and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio : 1) {
    .image-setting(@width; @marginLeft;@marginTop);
  }
}

//设备宽度和屏幕宽度，pad2 竖屏
.image-pad2-v(@width; @marginLeft: @5scl-72-margin-h-left;
                @marginTop: @5scl-72-margin-h-top){
  @media (min-width : @screen-pad2) and (max-device-width :
          @screen-pad2a) and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio : 1) {
    .image-setting(@width; @marginLeft;@marginTop);
  }
}

//笔记本
.image-lg-md(@width; @marginLeft: @5scl-72-margin-h-left;
                @marginTop: @5scl-72-margin-h-top){
  @media (min-width: @screen-lg-md) and (max-width: @screen-lg-mdx) {
    .image-setting(@width; @marginLeft;@marginTop);
  }
}

 //笔记本，ie,firefix
.image-lg-xl(@width; @marginLeft: @5scl-72-margin-h-left;
                @marginTop: @5scl-72-margin-h-top){
  @media(min-width: @screen-lg-xl) and (max-width: @screen-lg-xlx){
    .image-setting(@width; @marginLeft;@marginTop);
  }
}

.image-lg-chrome(@width; @marginLeft: @5scl-72-margin-h-left;
                @marginTop: @5scl-72-margin-h-top){
  @media (min-width: @screen-lg-chrome) and (max-width: @screen-lg-chromex) {
    .image-setting(@width; @marginLeft;@marginTop);
  }
}


@import-once "mixins/image-query";
@import-once "abcvariables";
//左右分裂,t图片基于80*80
.thumbnail-image-content-abc {
  padding-top:@content-72-72-padding-top;
  padding-right:@content-72-72-padding-right;
  padding-bottom:@content-72-72-padding-bottom;
  margin-bottom:@content-72-72-margin-bottom;
  margin-right:@content-72-72-margin-right;
  border:1px solid #ddd;

  border-radius:4px;
  transition:border 0.2s ease-in-out;
  //line-height:1.2;
  font-size: 14px;
  width: 100%;
  height: @72-72-content-height;

  .height-6plus-v(@6plus-container-v-high);
  .height-6plus-h(@6plus-container-h-high);
  //华为5寸，竖屏
  .height-5scl-v(@5scl-72-container-v-high);
   //华为5寸，横屏
  .height-5scl-h(@5scl-72-container-h-high);

  //三星5.8寸 GT-152，竖屏
  .height-gt-v(@gt-72-container-v-high);
  .height-gt-v(@gt-72-container-h-high);

    //基础类中也包括它
   .thumbnail-buttons-abc{
    .btn{
      font-size: 10px;
    }
    bottom: -10px;
    position:relative;
    .bottom-gt-v(@72-image-botton-bottom-gt-v);
    .bottom-gt-h(@72-image-botton-bottom-gt-h);
    .bottom-6plus-v(@72-image-botton-bottom-6plus-v);
    .bottom-6plus-h(@72-image-botton-bottom-6plus-h);
    .bottom-5scl-v(@72-image-botton-bottom-5scl-v);
    .bottom-5scl-h(@72-image-botton-bottom-5scl-h);
  }


  //基础类中也包括它
  .thumbnail-operator-abc {
    top: 20%;
    right:0;
    position:absolute;
    opacity: 0.6;
    .btn{
      display: block;
    }
  }

  img{
    position:relative;
    float:left;
    margin-top:@image-72-72-margin-top;
    margin-left: @image-72-72-margin-left;
    margin-right:@image-72-72-margin-left;

    width:@image-72-72;
    height:@image-72-72;
    //竖屏
    .image-6plus-v(@6plus-image-v-with);
    //横屏
    .image-6plus-h(@6plus-image-h-with);
    //
    .image-5scl-v(@5scl-72-image-v-with);
    .image-5scl-h(@5scl-72-image-h-with);
    //5.8
    .image-gt-v(@gt-72-image-v-with);
    .image-gt-h(@gt-72-image-h-with);
  }

  .image-right{
    float: right;
  }

  .image-static{
    float: none;
  }

  .thumbnail-operator-right-abc{
    &:extend(.thumbnail-operator-abc);
  }

  .thumbnail-content-abc{
    margin-top:4px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    h5,p{
      margin-bottom: 4px;
      margin-top: 4px;
    }
    &:extend(.content-list-font-xs  .common);
    .content-sytle.title-setting(h5;1.4;inherit;inherit);
    .content-sytle.content;
    h5{
      &:extend(.content-list-font-xs  .title);
    }

    .btn{
      &:extend(.content-list-font-xs  .content);
    }
    p{
      &:extend(.content-list-font-xs > .content);
    }

  };
}

//4列做出
.thumbnail-container-x4-abc{
  &:extend(.thumbnail-image-content-abc);
  height:116px;
  width: 80%;
  border: none;
  //border-right-color: #ddd;
  //border-right-width: 1px;
  //border-right-style: solid;
  padding-left:10px;
  .element-preperty .pc-lg-xl(height;102px);
  .element-preperty .pc-lg-chrome(height;9rem);
  .element-preperty .apple-pad2-v(height;10rem);
  .element-preperty .apple-pad2-h(height;10.8rem);
  .element-preperty .android-dpr1g-h(height;102px);
  .element-preperty .android-dpr1g-v(height;106px);
  .element-preperty .android-dpr2-h(height;10.5rem);
  .element-preperty .android-dpr2-v(height;10.5rem);

  .thumbnail-xs4-abc{
    &:extend(.content-list-font-xs  .common);
    .content-sytle.title-setting(h5;1.4;inherit;inherit);
    .content-sytle.content;
    h5{
      &:extend(.content-list-font-xs  .title);
    }
    .btn{
      &:extend(.content-list-font-xs  .content);
    }
    p{
      &:extend(.content-list-font-xs > .content);
    }
  }
}

/////////////////////////////////////////////
//单列显示
.thumbnail-container-single-abc{
  &:extend(.thumbnail-image-content-abc);
  //style={{height:"14rem",lineHeight:"1.4"}}
  height:13rem;
  width: 100%;

  .widthAndHeight-6plus-v(auto,13rem);
  .widthAndHeight-6plus-h(auto,13rem);

  .widthAndHeight-5scl-v(auto;126px);
  .widthAndHeight-5scl-h(auto;110px);

   //gt
  .widthAndHeight-gt-v(auto;11rem);
  .widthAndHeight-gt-h(auto;11rem);

  .widthAndHeight-pad2-v(auto;13rem);
  .widthAndHeight-pad2-h(auto;13rem);

  .widthAndHeight-lg-chrome(auto;13rem);
  .widthAndHeight-lg-xl(auto;16rem);

  .thumbnail-checkbox-single-abc{
    position:relative;
    float: right;
    padding-top:4rem;

    .padding-6plus-v(4rem;auto;auto;auto);
    .padding-lg-xl(4rem;auto;auto;auto);

    .padding-5scl-v(26px;auto;auto;auto);
    .padding-5scl-h(20px;auto;auto;auto);
    //4
    .padding-pad2-h(2rem,auto;auto;auto);
    .padding-pad2-v(10%,auto;auto;auto);

    .padding-gt-h(3rem;auto;auto;auto);

  }

  .thumbnail-content-abc{
    position:relative;
    height:12rem;
    margin-top:-2px;
    .widthAndHeight-6plus-v(auto,10.6rem);
    .widthAndHeight-6plus-h(auto,10rem);


    .widthAndHeight-lg-chrome(auto;12rem);
    .widthAndHeight-lg-xl(auto;14rem);

    .widthAndHeight-5scl-v(auto;96px);
    .widthAndHeight-5scl-h(auto;90px);

    .widthAndHeight-gt-v(-2px;96px);
    .widthAndHeight-gt-h(-6px;90px);

    .widthAndHeight-pad2-v(auto;11rem);

    .widthAndHeight-pad2-h(auto;11.6rem);

    .margin-6plus-v(-4px;auto;auto;auto);

    .margin-6plus-h(-4px;auto;auto;auto);

    .margin-5scl-v(-4px;auto;auto;auto);

    .margin-5scl-h(-4px;auto;auto;8px);

    .margin-gt-v(-2%;auto;auto;0);
    .margin-gt-h(-2%;auto;auto;0);

    .margin-lg-xl(2%;auto;auto;auto);

    .margin-pad2-h(-4px;auto;auto;auto);


    &:extend(.content-list-font-md  .common);
    .content-sytle.title-setting(h5);
    .content-sytle.title-setting(label);
    .content-sytle.content;

    h5{
      &:extend(.content-list-font-md  .title);
    }

    .btn{
      &:extend(.content-list-font-md  .content);
    }
    p{
      &:extend(.content-list-font-md > .content);
    }

  }


  .thumbnail-image-single-abc{
    &:extend(.thumbnail-b-image-abc .b-image);
    float: left;
    width:100px;
    height:100px;
     //竖屏
    .image-6plus-v(110px);
    .image-6plus-h(10.2rem);

    .image-5scl-v(96px,auto,6px);
    .image-5scl-h(90px,8px,6px);

    .image-gt-v(96px,auto,0px);
    .image-gt-h(96px,auto,0px);

    //Chromae 10rem
    .image-lg-chrome(86%);
    .image-lg-xl(86%);
    //
    .image-pad2-v(10rem;4px;10px);
    .image-pad2-h(12rem;auto;4px);
  }

  //botton调整
  .thumbnail-operator-abc{
    .btn{
      padding:2px 4px;
      border:none
    }
  }

  .thumbnail-toolbar-abc{
    &:extend(.btn-toolbar);
    .thumbnail-operator-abc;
    bottom: -16px;

    .toolbar-inline(absolute);

    .element-preperty .pc-lg-xl(bottom;0px);
    .element-preperty .pc-lg-chrome(bottom;-8px);
    button{
        //display: inline;
      margin-left:0;
    }
  }

  .thumbnail-toolbar-inimage-abc{
    &:extend(.btn-toolbar);
    .thumbnail-operator-abc;
    left:0.1rem;
    //position:absolute;
    bottom: 1.1rem;
    height: 2rem;
    opacity: 0.6;
    .toolbar-inline(absolute);
    .form-control{
      &:extend(.form-control);
      width:4rem;
      height:24px;
      font-size: 9px;
      font-weight: 700;
    }
    button{
      margin-left:0;
    }

  }
}

.thumbnail-container-common-abc {

  &:extend(.thumbnail-b-image-abc);
  //显示在图片下面的操作按钮，和内容下面的操作按钮
  .thumbnail-toolbar-abc{
      &:extend(.btn-toolbar);
      position:relative;
      width:90%;
      font-size: 9px;
      line-height: 1.6;
      margin-left:-14px;
      .toolbar-inline;
      .thumbnail-btn{
        &:extend(.btn);
        &:extend(.content-list-font-md  .content);
        .btn-default;

        border:none;
        padding:2px 6px
      }
  }

  .thumbnail-toolbar-nomargin-abc{
    .thumbnail-toolbar-abc;
    margin-left:0;
  }
  .thumbnail-image-abc{
    width:95px;
    height: 121px;

  }

  .thumbnail-content-abc {
    &:extend(.content-list-font-md  .common);
    .content-sytle.title-setting(h5);
    .content-sytle.title-setting(h6);
    .content-sytle.title-setting(label);
    .content-sytle.content;

    margin-top:-10px;
    margin-left: 6px;

    h6,h5{
      &:extend(.content-list-font-md  .title);
    }

    p{
      &:extend(.content-list-font-md > .content);
    }
    .cashContent {

      .content-sytle.title-setting(h5);
      .content-sytle.content;
      .inline {
        //display: inline;
      }
      p{
        display:inline-flex;
        display: -webkit-inline-box;
        display:-ms-inline-flexbox;
        display:-moz-inline-box;
      }
      .number-postion {
        float: right;

      }
    }
  }

  .thumbnail-content-abc-xs{
    &:extend(.thumbnail-content-abc);
    .content-sytle.title-setting(h5);
    .content-sytle.title-setting(h6);

    h6,h5{
      &:extend(.content-list-font-xs .title);
    }
    p{
      &:extend(.content-list-font-xs  .content);
    }
  }
}


//左边的图为with:"163px",height:"192px"
//右边图为80*80
//容器宽度
@width-margin:50px;
@height-margin:50px;
//容器外补白
.margin-setting--lg{
  .list-lg .margin-left;
}
.margin-setting--md{
  .list-lg .margin-left;
}
.margin-setting--sm{
  .list-lg .margin-left;
}
//左边大图所包含的内容
.abc-content-lg{

  font-size: small;
   width:        @lg-content-col-width;
  .list-lg .col-width;
  border: @none-border;
  .image{
      z-index:@image-z-index;
      width:@lg-image-width ;
      height:@lg-image-hight;
      //调整边界
      margin-left: @margin-left;
      margin-bottom: 6px;
      .margin-setting--lg;
      .list-lg .image-width;
  }
  .image-1-2{
    .image;
    .list-lg .image-width(0.85);
  }
  .image-1-1{
    .image;
    .list-lg .image-width(0.85;0.6);
  }
  //大图缩小
  .image-s{
    .image;
    .list-lg .image-width(0.85);
  }
  .abc-toolbar{
    .toolbar-inline;
    .btn-toolbar;

    .thumbnail-btn{
      &:extend(.content-list-font-xs  .content);
      .btn-abc;
      padding:2px,6px;
      .element-preperty .boot-min(padding;2px 2px);
    }
    margin-left: @margin-left;
    .margin-setting--lg;

  }
  .abc-content{
    line-height:normal;
    width:@lg-content-width;
    .content-sytle.title-setting(h5;1.4;relative;inherit);
    .content-sytle.content;
    margin-left: @margin-left;
    .element-preperty .boot-min(margin-left;2px);
    .margin-setting--lg;
    .list-lg .content-width(1);
    //h6,h5,p{
    //  width: @lg-text-width;
    //}
    h6,h5,.btn{
      &:extend(.content-list-font-md  .title);
    }

    p{
      &:extend(.content-list-font-md  .content);
    }
  }
}
//大图在上面增加空白
.abc-content-lg-top{

  margin-bottom: 6px;

}

//大图长度乘1.5

//上面大图，中等图形的
.abc-content-md {
  border: @none-border;
  width: @md-content-col-width;
  .list-md .content-width(0.5);
  padding-bottom:6px;
  font-size: small;
  .abc-content{
    .content-sytle.title-setting(h5;1.4;relative;inherit);
    .content-sytle.title-setting(h5;1.4;relative;inherit);
    .content-sytle.content;
    width:@md-content-width;
    margin-left: @margin-left;
     .element-preperty .boot-min(margin-left;2px);
     .list-md .content-width(1.5);
    //调整边界
    .margin-setting--lg;
    //h6,h5,p{
    //  width: @md-text-width;
    //}
    h6,h5,.btn{
      &:extend(.content-list-font-md  .title);
    }

    p{
      &:extend(.content-list-font-md  .content);
    }
  }
  .abc-toolbar{
    .abc-content-lg .abc-toolbar;
  }
  .image{
      z-index:@image-z-index;
      width:@md-image-width;
      height:@md-image-height;
      margin-left: @margin-left;
     .margin-setting--md;
     .list-md .image-width;
  }

  .image-h{
    .image;
    .list-md .image-width(2.2,0.5);
  }
  .image-right{
    .image;
      position: absolute;
      right: 2px;
      top: 20px;
      margin-top:-16px;
  }
}
.abc-content-row-4{
  @media (min-width: @screen-xpv) and (max-width: @screen-xpvx)

    margin-left:-15px !important;

  }
  @media (min-width: @screen-xp) and (max-width: @screen-xpx ) and  (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio : 3){
    margin-left:-15px !important;
  }

  .abc-content-md;

  .image{
    width: @md-image-height;
    height: @md-image-height;

    .list-md .image-width(1.2);
    @media (min-width: @screen-xp) and (max-width: @screen-xpx ) and  (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio : 3){
      .list-md .image-width(2.4);
    }
    @media(min-width: @screen-lg-xl) and (max-width: @screen-lg-xlx){
      .list-md .image-width(2.2);
    }
  }

  .abc-content{
    word-wrap:break-word;
    overflow:hidden;
    text-overflow:ellipsis;
    h6,h5,p{
      width: @md-text-width;
    }
    .abc-content-md .abc-content;
    width:@xs-content-col-width;
    @media (min-width: @screen-xp) and (max-width: @screen-xpx ) and  (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio : 3){
      h6,h5,.btn{

      }

      p{
        width: 100px;
        &:extend(.content-list-font-lg  .content);
      }

    }
    @media(min-width: @screen-lg-xl) and (max-width: @screen-lg-xlx){
      h6,h5,.btn{
        &:extend(.content-list-font-lg  .title);
      }

      p{
        &:extend(.content-list-font-lg  .content);
      }
    }
  }
}

////////////////竖屏时不显示外围边界/////////////////
.container-list-abc{
  .col-xs-6,
  .col-lg-2{
    .element-preperty .props-horizontal(border-bottom-style;solid);
    .element-preperty .props-horizontal(border-bottom-width;1px);
    .element-preperty .props-horizontal(border-bottom-color;#ddd);
  }
  //偶数时增加左右边框
  //使用公式 (an + b)。描述：表示周期的长度，n 是计数器（从 0 开始），b 是偏移值。
  .col-xs-6,
  .col-xp-6,
  .col-lg-4,
  .col-lg-2{
    .element-preperty .props-horizontal(border-left-style;solid);
    .element-preperty .props-horizontal(border-left-width;1px);
    .element-preperty .props-horizontal(border-left-color;#ddd);
      .element-preperty .props-horizontal(border-right-style;solid);
      .element-preperty .props-horizontal(border-right-width;1px);
      .element-preperty .props-horizontal(border-right-color;#ddd);
  }


}

.abc-table{
  &:extend(.table);
  //border: @default-border;
  border:@none-border;
  border-top-style: inherit;
  border-top-width: 1px;
  border-top-color: #d4d4d4;

  border-bottom-style: inherit;
  border-bottom-width: 1px;
  border-bottom-color: #d4d4d4;
  margin-bottom:0px !important;
  border-spacing:1px 1px;

  td,th{
    width: 50%;
    padding: 0 !important;
    vertical-align:top;

  }
  tr{
    outline: none;
    //height: 100px;
  }
  
  //多列
  .td-1-2{//左边
    border: @default-border;
    border-left-style:none;
    width: 50%*@table-left-precent;
    //最后一个元素没有右边界
    &:first-child {

    }
    &:last-child {
      .element-preperty .props-vertical(border-right-style;none);
      .element-preperty .props-horizontal(border-right-style;none);
    }
  }

  //右边
  .td-1-2-r{
    border: @default-border;
    border-right-style:none;
    border-left-style:none;

    width: 50%*@table-right-precent;
    height: 110px;
    .element-preperty .boot-min(height;86px);
    .element-preperty .boot-xs-min(height;86px);
    .element-preperty .android-dpr2-v(height;90px);
    .element-preperty .android-dpr2-h(height;90px);
    .element-preperty .android-dpr1g-v(height;90px);
    .element-preperty .android-dpr1g-v(height;90px);
    .element-preperty .boot-desktop(height;90px);
    .element-preperty .boot-max(height;130px);

  }
  //上边,无用边框
  .td-1-2-t{
    border: @default-border;
    border-right-style:none;
  }

  //下边
  .td-1-2-b{
    border: @default-border;
    border-left-style:none;
    //第一个元素没有右边界
    &:first-child {

    }
    &:last-child {
      .element-preperty .props-vertical(border-right-style;none);
      .element-preperty .props-horizontal(border-right-style;none);
    }
    width: 100px;
  }

  .td-edit-button-left{
    width:5%;
    vertical-align:middle;
    border: @default-border;
    border-left-style:none;
  }
  .td-edit-button-right{
    width:5%;
    vertical-align:middle;
    border: @default-border;
    border-right-style:none;

  }
}

 .content-list-font-xs  .content;

.clearfix() {
  &:before,
  &:after {
    content: " "; // 1
    display: table; // 2
  }
  &:after {
    clear: both;
  }
}
